specifications.Finish: Decoration > Embroidery Embroidery is a decorative finishing that uses different stitches, yarns, and materials to create patterns on the fabric. This process adds visual interest, texture, and a handcrafted feel.
specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > High Twist Yarn High twist yarn is made by tightly twisting staple fibers or filament yarns, resulting in a higher number of twists per unit length. It adds texture, a crisp feeling, and a cool touch to the fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Line dry Do not tumble dry Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use Bridal, Dresses
